line[0]="Put up the barriers shut down your senses" line[1]="Cover up with all of your pretences" line[2]="See no evil, your eyes are blunted" line[3]="We are the hunters, we are the hunted" line[4]="Place it in your memory" line[5]="Leave it in your past" line[6]="But don't forget" line[7]="Taking a tumble, I'm taking a dive" line[8]="Sometimes I stumble when my mind's made up" line[9]="Reaction levels seem strangely muted" line[10]="Ordinary acts of fun have been diluted" line[11]="Place it in your memory" line[12]="Leave it in your past" line[13]="But don't forget" line[14]="" line[15]=":D Happy Birthday, DPM!
